Trial_Design.evidence: patients with resected pancreatic ductal adenocarcinoma (PDA) received either gemcitabine (GEM) or 5-fluorouracil (5-FU) adjuvant monotherapy

Participants.evidence: Tissue samples from 379 patients with PDA enrolled in the European Study Group of Pancreatic Cancer-3 trial

Intervention.evidence: patients with resected pancreatic ductal adenocarcinoma (PDA) received either gemcitabine (GEM) or 5-fluorouracil (5-FU) adjuvant monotherapy

Objective.evidence: We tested cytoplasmic HuR (cHuR) as a predictive marker for response to chemotherapy

Method_Outcome.evidence: There was no association between cHuR expression and prognosis in the overall cohort

Number_Randomised.evidence: Tissue samples from 379 patients with PDA

Result_Outcome.evidence: Median DFS for patients with high cHuR was significantly greater for patients treated with 5-FU compared to GEM [20.1 months, confidence interval (CI): 8.3–36.4 vs 10.9 months, CI: 7.5–14.2; P = 0.04]
